documentation.text:
Rewards Calculation:
 rewards = (stakedTokens * blockDiff * rewardRatePerBlock)
 rewardRatePerBlock =
 4000 (REWARD_RATE)
 ------------------
 10000 * 365 (days/Y) * 24 (H/day) * 60 (M/H) * 4 (Blocks/M) = 21024e6
